storyInfo: Ashlock Greynuty's competitor in this match is the infamous heel, 'Brassrust' Ingra. A sturdy cannon versus a sharp axe. An Infected knight versus a noble knight. Future versus past. Just which one will claim victory?

attributes.content: Where are we going, Granny?
attributes.name: Young Girl

attributes.content: It's not the right time for you to ask.
attributes.name: Dignified Grandmother

attributes.content: Hold tight to your pouch, and stay close to me.
attributes.name: Dignified Grandmother

attributes.content: Yes, Granny.
attributes.name: Young Girl

attributes.content: We're almost there.
attributes.name: Dignified Grandmother

attributes.content: What's that there?
attributes.name: Young Girl

attributes.content: An arena. Built by bastards from the Grand Knight Territory.
attributes.name: Dignified Grandmother

attributes.content: Humph.
attributes.name: Dignified Grandmother

attributes.content: Are we going to see a match?
attributes.name: Young Girl

attributes.content: A match? No.
attributes.name: Dignified Grandmother

attributes.content: I'm taking you for training.
attributes.name: Dignified Grandmother

attributes.content: Do you still remember the things I taught you?
attributes.name: Dignified Grandmother

attributes.content: Yes, Granny, I haven't forgotten any!
attributes.name: Young Girl

attributes.content: It's shield up, cannon up, and bombard!
attributes.name: Young Girl

attributes.content: Eyes on the enemy, watch your ammunition, don't let your cannon go!
attributes.name: Young Girl

attributes.content: And, um...
attributes.name: Young Girl

attributes.content: When the cannon fire rings through the air, victory is already within sight!
attributes.name: Young Girl

attributes.content: Very good.
attributes.name: Dignified Grandmother

attributes.content: You're a lot more dependable than your father.
attributes.name: Dignified Grandmother

attributes.content: At least someone else will remember these before I close my eyes for good.
attributes.name: Dignified Grandmother

attributes.content: Please don't be so gloomy, Granny...
attributes.name: Young Girl

attributes.content: Heh. A tree may be a century old, but its roots will all be rotten.
attributes.name: Dignified Grandmother

attributes.content: Better to be fertilizer for the new buds than to wither away like this.
attributes.name: Dignified Grandmother

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Dignified Grandmother

attributes.content: Granny!
attributes.name: Young Girl

attributes.content: It's all right, it was just a little cough. Nothing to worry about.
attributes.name: Dignified Grandmother

attributes.content: Your father's generation. Even my few brothers. They've all long forgotten how the Kaliskas came to prosper.
attributes.name: Dignified Grandmother

attributes.content: Forestry? That forest was given back to us upon our high deeds, upon our cannon fire!
attributes.name: Dignified Grandmother

attributes.content: 'When the cannon fire rings through the air, victory is already within sight'... All those bastards, with all their money, can't even remember the saying!
attributes.name: Dignified Grandmother

attributes.content: Granny, please don't get angry...
attributes.name: Young Girl

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Dignified Grandmother

attributes.content: Greynuty, you're a good sprout.
attributes.name: Dignified Grandmother

attributes.content: Don't grow twisted.
attributes.name: Dignified Grandmother

attributes.content: Yes, Granny, I won't disappoint you!
attributes.name: Young Girl

attributes.content: The Bloodboil Knightclub's—Butcher of the Field—back after nursing those injuries—as ruthless as ever!!
And on—the other—side—
*cough*, *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Dignified Grandmother

attributes.content: Once the foresting magnate of the south—a name out of the Kaliska Group—
But now an Infected—part of the Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub—
Let's give a big warm welcome to—
Granny?
attributes.name: Young Girl

attributes.content: (Huff... relax. Granny already taught me. I can do this.)
attributes.name: Young Girl

attributes.content: (I'm ready!)
attributes.name: Young Girl

attributes.content: The Ashlock Knight, Greynuty Kaliska!
Man, oh, man, Ashley finally takes the field.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: She's never in a hurry. Never gives the audience the time of day, either. Reveling just isn't Greynuty.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: That's her selling point. Some people are suckers for that. Look over there.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Greynuty! Greynuty, look at me!!!
attributes.name: Excited Fan

attributes.content: Eh... yeah, it works.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: There's no faking cheers.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: And that posture, the hunker with the cannon, it's got noble written between the lines.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Course I'm still most excited for her to fire off, though.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Well, you're gonna get that. The crowd's gone wild hearing the rumbles.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Just wish there was more to get a kick out of.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: What, you want her bashing with the barrel?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Haha. Man, I hope I see it, if it ever happens.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Humongous hatchet meets sturdy shield! Who'll come out on top? We'll just have to wait and see!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Switch your terminals on, make your choice, and give your competitor your support!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: And before we forget, the most important part—grab that chance to stuff your wallet full!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Let the match—begiiiiiinnnnnnnn—!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: You'd best hope that hunk of plastic holds out.
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Oripathic filth.
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Baah, that's dull. She's not even saying anything.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: This isn't your first time watching Ashley compete. It's called being serious. D'ja know what being serious is?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: But this is mad boring... if you don't vent your feelings, how're you gonna keep momentum against your opponent?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Knight competitions aren't yelling contests, jeez. The important thing is to look good standing off.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: See, just like that. Brassrust's getting forced back, and everyone's on cloud nine, right?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: You don't think this match is too calm, though? Barely any active attacks.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You've gotta pick your opponents. With knights like Brassrust who go all in on offense, you wanna put together a good defense to be optimal.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: And Ashley can use her favorite move now.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Block with a shield bash, get a shot in. Tried and tested.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: (Ashley doesn't seem that hungry to attack this match. What's on her mind, huh?)
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: It's a shocker! The Butcher's cleaver has nowhere to go before the Ashlock Knight!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Each time he attacks! Each blast he takes! Ingra gives, but he gets nothing!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The Ashlock Knight's defense is perfect, and she's making every step forward hers, squeezing down the space the Butcher has to move!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Without a doubt, this is a battle of back and forth! We won't know who'll wear the victory laurel until the final moment!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Get your terminals out and lay your bets on your knight of choice!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Or buy a water bottle with your contestant's logo straight away, specially provided by the Major, and let the crowd around you know just who you support!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Order now! We're ready to hook you up, right there in your seats!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: That's something they do now?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: They do, but, uh...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: These prices... why don't I just step out of the arena and come back with ten bottles?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Haha...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: You wouldn't order one...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Just one. Just to try, heheh.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Can you do anything besides shrink behind that plastic board, hmm?
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Hah. You'll have time to scream once I shatter it, rock-festered mouse.
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: A petty firm like the Kaliskas would never collect your corpse.
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: (Pulls trigger)
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Whoa, Ashley's pissed now!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Ingra's being too cruel, though. What's he keep yanking her sore spots for?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Kaliska Forestry used to be pretty well-known, but you don't hear much about it in the news lately.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Can't be something to do with Greynuty.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: If they had her doing things, they might still be as big as ever.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Doing piss-poor management yourself, taking it out on the others. Not a recipe for company success.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I heard it was at the table she got expelled from the family. Facing her uncles and aunts. Voted out by all.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Unanimous passage...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: So her mom and dad...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Yeah, I hear blackmail had them throwing their own daughter out.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Had the funds for Ashley to head Grand Knight Territory-ways later, though.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: But'cha probably figure, y'know. There's your parents, and everything sensible says they oughta be with you. And they put their hands up too...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: That's just gotta hurt.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Good thing Ashley's strong enough stuff.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Especially strong.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Uh... she can't be pissed for REAL real.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Lemme look—
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: We're good, we're good.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: It's normal enough to be mad at a time like this, right?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: For sure, I'd ream a hole straight through Brassrust before thinking about the rest.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Ashley takes fights too cerebral, and ammo runs out. If she fires a round throwing a fit, she might just be boned.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Still oughta be the phase where she makes Brassrust THINK she's angry.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: After all, misleading your opponent's important too.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Look.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I'm floored, and I bet you are too! Ingra's shoulder plates have been blasted to smithereens!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The Ashlock Knight is still pressing forward step by step! Could victory be at hand? Is the proclamation coming?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Another crack of shellfire! It looks like the Ashlock Knight's got her own personal victory salute covered!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: What's this?! Did you see that, everyone?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Brassrust just cleaved a shell apart with his hatchet! We'd be remiss not to thank our two contestants! You only get spectacles like this on the soaps!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: That's right, I'm talking about the classic scene from the Słoma-funded suspense-in-the-city production, 24 Nights in the G.K.T.! Anyone in the audience interested, you can put an order in for the discs straight away!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The first thirty to buy'll get a poster signed by the two leads! First come, first served! Don't miss out!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Glug, glug—phew. Man, this is basically the same as convenience store water.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Didn't I warn you already...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Heehee. Whatever, let's just say I bought it for her.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Forget that. Mob never misses a chance to shill, huh. Really gets on your nerves...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: That's his job, isn't it? What else would he do?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Who thought Brassrust could cut a shell clean through, though? Really forced an ad spot right into Mob's lap.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: If only Ashley didn't go soft for a moment. Wanted to knock Brassrust down, didn't aim for his head...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Match would've been over by now.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Her magazine's gotta be drying up.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Mmm.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Only one shot left, I think.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Time to swap mags.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Here's hoping Ingra doesn't give our Ashley any trouble then.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: (One round left.)
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: (Gotta push him off, hop back on the recoil, and that should give me enough time.)
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: (With Ingra's competition style, he shouldn't have any out.)
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: (This is the moment.)
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Is that all you can do?
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: (He sped up?)
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: (Shit!)
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Is that a—thruster on Brassrust's shoes?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: There's a wrench in the plan...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: You've got this, Ashley!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: *cough*...
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: You're out of shells. What else can you do?
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: D'ya still have ammo, Ashley?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: None. I just used the reserve to block the bolts.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: What now, then? Gonna bash with the barrel?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: If you need it, I can make a distraction for you.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: And then ride the opportunity to take my points like last time?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: C'mon, let that go already...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: We'd only just met then. Be a problem not having your guard up.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I won't do it again. We agreed on that.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I can trust you not to sacrifice other Infected for your own benefit, Greynuty.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: So you can trust Sona here not to stab you in the back.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Right?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Hmph. I suppose.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: So how are you gonna face down these knights now?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I can definitely make you a little space. Shout if you need me.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I won't.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: I've got my methods.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Fresh from the advantage, the Ashlock Knight has been caught out reloading! Brassrust begins his revenge! Could the Butcher's cleaver taste blood when all's said and done?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Just how is the Ashlock Knight gonna counter? There she goes—she's thrown her empty magazine at Brassrust, but it's had no—
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Oh, wait a moment, sister, she's thrown her cannon down too and is charging Brassrust! What is she up to?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Ingra's got his weapon up, and the Ashlock Knight only has a shield to her name! Ashlock—Ashlock has blocked the battleaxe, and—ooh!! She's clocked him straight in the head! I heard that all the way from here!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Ooh! Back-to-back and hand-to-hand! It's a barrage! Ingra's on the retreat!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Greynuty's rolled right back to her weapon, swapped and loaded! Not a beat missed! Is Ingra in for another artillery lockdown?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Ah-ha! We're once again treated to the sound of cannon fire! The Ashlock Knight has the situation back under control!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Might be a little ugly, but... that's a pretty practical way to disengage.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Never dreamt she'd go so fast once she dropped that cannon, though.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Ashley's a Zalak too, y'know. A little agility's par for our course.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: So why won't she use a light weapon like yours?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Personal preference, I guess.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I suggested she could switch to a more arena-friendly long-ranger—javelins, crossbows, slings, stuff like that. She's not a fan of any of them. Just likes using that old family cannon.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: She can't even put it to full use sometimes, and the maintenance is a pain.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: That's stubborn, alright.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You get used to it, y'know.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I think she's down to her last eight rounds.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: If she runs clean out, what happens?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I've got no idea. What DOES happen?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I've never seen Ashley use up all her reserve ammo before.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: ...*pant*, *pant*—Are you toying with me, Ashlock?!
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Say something—you damned—rock!
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: (Pulls trigger)
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: How long do you plan on playing the mute?!
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: I've had enough—enough of this!
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Hrreaaagh!!
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Man, Ashley really is another level of horrible.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: There's no way she was planning a tug of war with Ingra from the start. Was she?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: She doesn't respond, she doesn't go down. She'd get me mad too.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Why?
Oh, Justyna, you made it.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Why is Ashlock bent on humiliating Brassrust?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Thaaat's a long story.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: When I ran into Ashley, she was stoked on anger, wrath for all the old knight lords at the top of the stands.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: The other Infected knights thought she just resented the old guard, pure and simple.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: But if—
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: If she wasn't an Infected, she'd be a knight noble too.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I've heard.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Post-infection, no-one her generation or above in her knight family showed her any sympathy.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Everyone put the blame for the family's slow fall on her.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Normal people would know that's nothing to do with getting ill.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: But that's what they did. Her family, every Kaliska Zalak agreed to strip Ashley of her position and boot her out of the lineage.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: She used to trust all the family, so much. She loved sharing fun stories with them. Comparing techniques with them.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: But in the end, no one she thought a friend reached out a hand to help.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I heard some were looking to have her disappeared altogether—
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: It—can't be that bad.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: One day, I was there. Helped keep them off Ashley.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: So you can guess why Ashley has such a bitter hatred for the old knight lords.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: As for Brassrust Ingra...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Every single thing he does is a deep sting on Ashley's heart.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: That's what's going on. I'm guessing it's why she was ready to stand off in a close contest until the end.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: To bring a lofty, high-ranking knight straight into the ground.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: And to... keep her own anger in check.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Hey, Justyna, can you tell how many shells Ashley has left in her mag for me?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Four.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Ooh.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Nearly closing time.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: A fierce offensive has not toppled the Ashlock Knight! And Brassrust is beginning to wear out!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: He's readying for his final charge!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: This marathon back-and-forth is about to pay off!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Ladies and gentlemen, knights and dames, keep an eye on your betting numbers, please! Who knows if you're suddenly in for a prize when the results come in!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: This post-match lottery is sponsored by Roar Guards Co., and the rates will boggle your mind! An astonishing zero point FIVE percent! If you still haven't placed your bets, you have one last chance now!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Ingra has lifted his hatchet, the blade of the abattoir!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Greynuty assumes a defensive position!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: We're about to see who wins and who loses!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Jeez, Louise! When'd Ashley make off with my moves?!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Brassrust is charging, he's still charging, Ashlock has her shield up, but she's pointed the barrel backwards!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Could she be taking Brassrust for a head-on impact?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Both are coming in hot, red-yellow-white-hot!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Ashlock's accelerated with her shelling and has sailed right by Brassrust's hatchet!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Too fast, way too fast!!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: She's ditched her shield, the barrel's against Ingra's back, she's pulled the trigger!!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The Brassrust Knight is down! The Ashlock Knight has taken the win!!!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Hold on, now Ashlock is aiming the barrel at Brassrust again! Could it be? The day the tyrannical Ingra is humiliated himself?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: ...Rgh. A Zalak shrunken in a shell.
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Ashlock... Greynuty... I'll remember... you.
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: When I'm healed... you... you Infected—will not live to tell one tale!
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: —You!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: (Pulls the trigger)
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Kgh...
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: (Aims barrel at the sky)
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: This shell is an offering to the spectators.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: You don't deserve it.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: You... urgh...
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: The Ashlock Knight has not dealt a closing blow to Ingra! With a final blast of a shell, she's left alone for the exit!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Greynuty! Greynuty—!
attributes.name: Excited Fan

attributes.content: This match's—lottery—prize—
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: How did you feel on that run?
attributes.name: Girl's Father

attributes.content: Not that good, Father. My hand still gets tremors holding the cannonlance for too long.
attributes.name: Grown Girl

attributes.content: Do you want to switch to a lighter weapon?
attributes.name: Girl's Father

attributes.content: No. The cannonlance suits me. Its might makes up for what I lack in flexibility.
attributes.name: Grown Girl

attributes.content: And besides, someday, I might not be fighting in the arena, but somewhere much vaster.
attributes.name: Grown Girl

attributes.content: Just like Grandmother.
attributes.name: Grown Girl

attributes.content: When that time comes, this weapon will surely be much more practical.
attributes.name: Grown Girl

attributes.content: Alright... as you wish.
attributes.name: Girl's Father

attributes.content: My little nut.
attributes.name: Girl's Father

attributes.content: Father, I'm not a child anymore. You don't need to call me that...
attributes.name: Grown Girl

attributes.content: Fair.
attributes.name: Girl's Father

attributes.content: Greynuty.
attributes.name: Girl's Father

attributes.content: You did well in training.
attributes.name: Girl's Father

attributes.content: If Grandma could see the strides you've made, I'm sure she'd be delighted.
attributes.name: Girl's Father

attributes.content: Grandmother...
attributes.name: Grown Girl

attributes.content: Before Grandma left, she made an agreement with some of the uncles. As long as you're willing to learn, they'll continue to pay your fees.
attributes.name: Girl's Father

attributes.content: So you don't need to worry about money.
attributes.name: Girl's Father

attributes.content: Whether or not you become a knight in the end, or inherit the family business.
attributes.name: Girl's Father

attributes.content: Keep practicing, and there'll be a day you become a famed cannonlancer of Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Girl's Father

attributes.content: Ah, how many generations it's been since the Kaliskas last had a true cannonlancer.
attributes.name: Girl's Father

attributes.content: All your ancestors would be proud of you.
attributes.name: Girl's Father

attributes.content: Don't let them down.
attributes.name: Girl's Father

attributes.content: Yes, Father.
attributes.name: Grown Girl

attributes.content: I won't.
attributes.name: Grown Girl

attributes.content: Hey, Ashley. Ashley?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Um—muh?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: What were you daydreaming about?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Nothing. Just thinking.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Poor-ass Ingra. Just came out of the hospital and you send him right back.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: He deserves it.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: And you still fired your last round in the air?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: The match was already over. Even if I can't stand the sight of Ingra, I won't do anything else to him.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Otherwise, what would separate me and him?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Shame, I was looking forward to a 'Butcher Suffers Slaughter'-type headline in the papers...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Chances are the Ingra family wouldn't let that news onto the papers at all.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Sona, I've actually been meaning to ask you for a little bit now...
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Hm? What's up, Ashley?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: What are you—holding there?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: An Ashlock water bottle.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Why would you buy something so useless?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: It worked out. I was thirsty, I couldn't be bothered to go out to buy water.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Yoo. Our knight returns triumphant.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I'll have to learn from you too, Ashlock, and become stronger.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Justyna, how'd 'that' go?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: It's done.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Alrighty. Good work, nice.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Once the reward hits, I'll wire it over to 'that account.' Word is the bank there's already watching frequent transfers.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Can we still use personal expenses for the ruse?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: What do you think?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Yeah, fair...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: We don't have much time left.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: But we don't need to think about it just yet.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: First, let's go celebrate!
attributes.name: Sona
